alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Rapid City; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 20 at 9:46AM MDT until May 21 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Wyoming and northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Rapid City; Southern Foot Hills
